textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: Time for another bonus stage! There are a whole lot of \n Starfish Bubbles hidden in this giant group of jellies. How\n many can you eat before the timer runs out?

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
BONUS BUBBLES:
 Eat the Score Multiplier bubbles to double the
 points for everything you eat! Also, keep an eye
 out for the Extra-Life Bubble!
